prompts: Create an ice-type Pokemon with shimmering blue fur and elegant ears.
I want a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of winter, with icy features and a graceful stance.
Generate a frosty Pokemon that excels in cold habitats and has a sleek, slender body.
Make a Pokemon with striking ice-themed accessories and a playful personality.
Imagine a Pokemon that can manipulate snow and ice, showcasing its elegance and agility.
Design a Pokemon that radiates a cool aura, with a focus on frosty abilities.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a winter creature, with beautiful ice-blue colors and fine details.
